statements: SELECT * FROM user_notifications;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_message FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Email' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, notification_type FROM user_notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2022-06-01';
SELECT notification_id, user_id, created_at FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = '98765432-1111-2222-3333-999999999999' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT notification_id, user_id FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT notification_message FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'warning' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'info' OR notification_type = 'error' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT action, timestamp FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT * FROM user_engagement ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_engagement WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE message ILIKE '%important%' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_engagement GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications_table;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM notifications_table WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM notifications_table GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;
SELECT update_type, updated_at FROM interaction_updates WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY updated_at ASC;
SELECT notification_text, created_at FROM notifications_table ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' AND engagement_time > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;

SELECT * FROM user_engagement ue INNER JOIN notifications_table nt ON ue.user_id = nt.user_id WHERE ue.engagement_type = 'comment' AND nt.notification_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY ue.engagement_time DESC;

SELECT nt.notification_text, ue.engagement_type, iu.update_type FROM notifications_table nt LEFT JOIN user_engagement ue ON nt.user_id = ue.user_id LEFT JOIN interaction_updates iu ON nt.user_id = iu.user_id WHERE ue.engagement_type = 'share' AND iu.update_type = 'update' ORDER BY nt.created_at DESC;

SELECT nt.notification_text, nt.created_at, ue.engagement_type FROM notifications_table nt LEFT JOIN user_engagement ue ON nt.user_id = ue.user_id WHERE nt.created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY nt.created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE status = 'unread';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, event_type, event_count FROM engagement ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, session_id, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT message, status FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE session_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_count FROM engagement WHERE event_count > 10 ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_notifications;
SELECT user_id, notification_text FROM user_notifications WHERE is_read = false;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_id, log_timestamp FROM notification_logs JOIN user_notifications ON notification_logs.notification_id = user_notifications.notification_id;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, push_notifications, sms_notifications FROM notification_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_notifications WHERE is_read = false;
SELECT user_id, notification_text FROM user_notifications WHERE is_read = true ORDER BY notification_id DESC;

SELECT notification_id, notification_text, is_read FROM user_notifications JOIN notification_logs ON user_notifications.notification_id = notification_logs.notification_id WHERE notification_logs.user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, email_notifications, push_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE user_id = 3;
